name: Meth'a Loop
description:
An unfinished game about not just a simple drug manufacturer, but a drug manufacturer STUCK IN A train LOOP, to avoid getting caught by the cops!
As he is doing his job in the back of the train, you (supposedly Donny) are supposed to handle the train, and take care of the road in front of you, and do everything what you are capable of to keep the train moving inside the loop.

Obstacles :
Lights - Pops in the right corner. To fix, turn all switches green and reset the lever.

Tracks - Pops in the right corner. To fix, hit the broken parts of the track with the hammer until they become normal.

Meth - Pops in the right corner. To fix, break the meth into powder first, and then take a good sniff after rolling the dollar bill.

Pressure - Right bottom controls, always keep as low as possible by dragging the bar.
Speed - Right bottom controls, always keep not to fast and not to slow either by dragging the bar.
Fuel - Right bottom controls, keep the fuel level at maximum by pressing the button to add more fuel.
Dampers - Right bottom controls, very even lap the dampers will require a fix, just press every damper to fix it.

Thanks to WATERFLAME for his great sound attribure : https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/968454
